actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the entire 5-cent increase in motor fuels taxes enacted by the Revenue Reconciliation Act of 1990 shall be deposited into the Highway Trust Fund.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the deposit of highway-related taxes in the Highway Trust Fund. Removes provisions which required a portion of gasoline excise taxes (including diesel and special motor fuels) to be used for deficit reduction.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the entire 5-cent increase in motor fuels taxes enacted by the Revenue Reconciliation Act of 1990 shall be deposited into the Highway Trust Fund.
